post.body: and @lnelson08 Thanks for retweets and compliments!
says 7 semi-trucks are involved in the I-80 accidents at West Branch, acc. to CR news reports.
Uh-huh... I can just imagine the bets being hedged tonight... Should I study for that final or...????
You're welcome! Drive safe!
Students hoping for a snow day tomorrow? I'm sure teachers wouldn't mind either... :-)
Watching it snow outside my window at @qctimes! Can't even see the river for the wall of white.
Cool. Well, if he wants to share with a wider audience, he can always blog about it on quadsville.com. We'll cheer him on!
Your son's project sounds neat. How can we follow along?
Got headphones? Just put 'em on. Even if there's nothing playing on them.
NWS: Snow will stop around sunrise with 3-5 inches in Quad Cities. http://snurl.com/8htlo
Just in: All branches of the Rock Island Public Library will close at 4 p.m. More closings here: http://www.qctimes.com/closings
Towing ban on I-80 from Mississippi River at least to Iowa City. http://snurl.com/8hp28
Just heard on scanner: Several vehicles stalled out in intersection of 38th St. and Black Hawk Road in Rock Island.
Find out if school's cancelled without getting out of bed: http://tinyurl.com/6akjw8
3 ways to keep up with road conditions and pass along tips: http://snurl.com/8hlr9
Make that 7 semis and a car in I-80 smash-up acc. to Iowa Press Citizen.
Just in: I-80 blocked in both directions at West Branch. Jack-knifed semis, I do believe. Please retweet.
Indigo in Moline just cancelled yoga classes for tonight. Report/find closings here: http://www.qctimes.com/closings
That's multiple... And @cszjd says Eldridge is a sheet of ice. I've also heard there are 2 semis stalled out on Centennial Bridge.
RT @iowadot ltiple Semi Accident on Interstate 80 : http://tinyurl.com/5f6yy3
Businesses, community & churches and road conditions included in that link, too.
Check here to see if your school is letting out early or cancelling evening activities: http://www.qctimes.com/closings/
Hearing that power is out in central Davenport. Downtown is affected. Anyone else without?
Twitter blackout for @quadsville till Friday. Safe travels. Here's some things to keep you amused if snowed in: http://is.gd/dk79
Good morning! Snowy out there. Stay indoors and snap some photos for our contest. You, too, could win a coffee mug! http://is.gd/daKM
Iowa City discusssing ban on plastic grocery sacks. What will you line your bathroom trashcan with now? http://is.gd/dbPz
Comment No. 3 is one good reason to keep your road rage to yourself. You never know who you're flipping off: http://is.gd/daOa
LOL Heard funniest 9-11 call this morning: Squirrel stuck in bird feeder. It got out before help arrived, but may forever have a limp.
Checking out this week's photo contest entries."Peace" is the theme. There's still time to get your photos in. http://is.gd/daKM
U.S. Rep. Phil Hare, D-IL, wants to know if you're going to inauguration: http://is.gd/daKa
American Idol almost-contestant Leo Marlowe spotted in Davenport bar: http://tinyurl.com/87tsk4
Scott Co. Sheriff's office says go slow and turn off the cruise control: http://is.gd/d92W
YAY! I can breathe again! RI approves burn ban: http://is.gd/da88
Holy cow, it's a mess out there, folks. Be especially careful on bridges and interstates. Many accidents already: http://is.gd/d92W
Good night, Quadsville! Stay warm!
Got a question? David Heitz will answer it in his Ask the Times column: http://is.gd/d1dj
Home for the holidays or stranded at the airport? http://is.gd/d1c4
Not so fast with that hot cocoa. Might contain melamine: http://is.gd/d0Xa
RT @iowadot I-35 Closed Near Osceola http://tinyurl.com/8nnbq5
Happy Birthday, Bill Wundram! @qctimes columnist turned 84 yesterday. Coldest. Birthday. Ever. :-) http://is.gd/d0T9
